title: 13: OBITCH we're livin' la vida loca
description:
OBITCH! This week we're taking you everywhere from famous last meals, a follow up on gruesome executions, some lovely obituaries, and of course, some dumb.ass.criminallllllllllls let's go! 

Rate & Review!
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors:
Apostrophe: Apostrophe.com/obit code ‘obit’ to save $15
